alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:10PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Flathead County through 545 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Whitefish, or 15 miles north of Evergreen, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitefish and Lupfer. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 122 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
